description: Non-material minor amendment of planning permission ref. P2014/4926/FUL dated 12 February 2015 for alterations to the previously approved fenestration (three windows and one door) to put a door in place of one of the windows and a window in place of the door.   (Listed Building Application Ref. P2016/0021/LBC).
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: Condition 2 of planning permission ref: P2014.4926/FUL should read:

DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Planning Design & Access Statement Dec 14 (Macdonald Planning Consultancy) 59:13:P25A, 59:13:P26C, 59:13:LOC01, Heritage Impact Assessment ref 13-040 dated 16/12/14, Letter ref 013.066.00 dated 13/05/14, 

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
